metadata.description: Empanada contains segmentation models for mitochondria, nuclei, and lipid droplets in EM images.

authors.name: Ryan Conrad
authors.affiliation: Center for Molecular Microscopy, Center for Cancer Research, National Cancer Institute, National Institutes of Health, Bethesda, MD 20892, USA

authors.name: Kedar Narayan
authors.affiliation: Center for Molecular Microscopy, Center for Cancer Research, National Cancer Institute, National Institutes of Health, Bethesda, MD 20892, USA

pubs.title: Instance segmentation of mitochondria in electron microscopy images with a generalist deep learning model trained on a diverse dataset
pubs.info: Main paper that describes model & data

params.name: Plane
params.tooltip: Whether to use all planes (XY, XZ, YZ) or a single plane

params.name: Downsampling
params.tooltip: Downsampling factor for the input image

params.name: Maximum objects
params.tooltip: Maximum number of objects to segment per class

params.name: Semantic only
params.tooltip: Only run semantic segmentation for all classes
